content: here s my beanie pattern that i use when gifting a baby blanket excellent project for using up scraps of yarn also very easy to take a few small balls on the go with you i ve provided the best words i can to describe the various stitches start with a magic_ring or slip knot and use half double crochets then the bead stitch and finish with a crab stitch lots of youtube videos are available if these stitches are new to you enjoy
